name: Ubuntu Desktop Image
summary: mbITme.de wants to create a ready to use ubuntu desktop image.
short_description:
mbITme.de wants to create a simple way to get started with linux, ubuntu and an other desktop environment. 

This is an full pre-installed and pre-configured image for Virtualbox. 

You only have to modify the mount path and your passwords to get started.

Installed packages:
http://pastebin.com/NRjRHpDt

(Synaptic, Chromium, Bluefish, Eclipse, Gambas2, KompoZer, MonoDevelop, Flash, Java, Filezilla, xChat, Gnome, Amarok, Audacity, VLC, Skype, Vuze)

Login:

Ubuntu Root:
Name: ubuntu
PW: reverse

Size (compressed/uncompressed): 3,15gb / 7,11gb

IP: DHCP

Version: Ubuntu Desktop 12.04 LTS
